full_text: Epstein Update From Ray Ormond To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Sonya Thompson Date 2019/07/24 10:56 Subject: Epstein Update Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf Inmate Epstein #76318-054 was removed from Suicide Watch and stepped down to Psychological Observation. He was just escorted to Health Services for a follow-up assessment/evaluation. Once completed, he will be escorted to Attorney Conference to meet with his Attorney. He has a pending incident report for Self-Mutilation and therefore, he will return to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and will be celled with inmate (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) he requested Protective Custody. His case has been highly publicized and he is in SHU because J. Ray Ormond Regional Director Northeast Region 215-521 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: Epstein Update From Ray Ormond To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Sonya Thompson Date 2019/07/24 10:56 Subject: Epstein Update Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf

Inmate Epstein #76318-054 was removed from Suicide Watch and stepped down to Psychological Observation. He was just escorted to Health Services for a follow-up assessment/evaluation. Once completed, he will be escorted to Attorney Conference to meet with his Attorney.
He has a pending incident report for Self-Mutilation and therefore, he will return to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and will be celled with inmate (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) he requested Protective Custody. His case has been highly publicized and he is in SHU because
J. Ray Ormond Regional Director Northeast Region 215-521 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C), indicating potentially sensitive information has been removed.
